did.unittitle: Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers' Industrial League Program

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers' Industrial League

did.abstract: Program of the Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers' Industrial League.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers' Industrial Leauge was based in New York, New York. It was affiliated with the Trade Union Unity League.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pamphlet outlining recent developments in the drug industry, working conditions for drug store workers, and the political stance of the Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers Industrial League, affiliated with the Trade Union Unity League.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Drug Store Workers' Section of the Medical Workers' Industrial League Program #5458m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
